name: priority: critical
description: Requires immediate action. Ignoring this could lead to significant problems.

name: priority: high
description: After critical issues are fixed, these should be dealt with before any further issues.

name: priority: low
description: This issue can probably be picked up by anyone looking to contribute to the project, as an entry fix

name: priority: medium
description: This issue may be useful, and needs some attention.

name: status: accepted
description: It's clear what the subject of the issue is about, and what the resolution should be.

name: status: blocked
description: There is another issue that needs to be resolved first.

name: type: dependencies
description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

name: type: deprecated
description: Marks features or elements for phased removal.

name: type: release
description: Marks a pull request that prepares for a new version.

name: type: tests
description: Pertains to the addition or improvement of tests.
